nodes.text: Chokee & Chokee was an independent polling agency.

During the early stages of the Clone Wars, the agency could report an approval rating of 81% for Chancellor Palpatine among citizens of the Inner Core.
This was the lowest point since the start of the conflict.

Mas Amedda used the polls to suggest the Chancellor was being tied up in bureaucratic red-tape by the Galactic Senate, to which he received boos and jeers from the attending Senators. As an upside for the Chancellor, the same polls showed the approval rating for the Senate holding at only 31%.
